db:info.db:title: Light3D QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Data Visualization | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Representation of a light source in 3D space.
This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Light3D represents a monochrome light source in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: [since QtDataVisualization 1.3] autoPosition : bool
db:section.db:para: Defines whether the light position follows the camera automatically.

db:note.db:para: Has no effect if shadows are enabled. Remember to disable shadows before setting light's position, or it will be overwritten by automatic positioning if this property is false.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.3.
